entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 20.
